sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SingleProductPage() { const [products, setProducts] = useState(null); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL + '/products/' + id) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => setProducts(res.products)) }, []) return (

Dell Inspiron 3511 Laptop, Intel i3-1115G4, 8GB, 512GB

Product # 387874kkfjkf

{products.price}

- +


Status: In Stock

Description:

Processor: Intel i5-1235U (3.30 GHz up to 4.40 GHz), 10 Cores & 12MB Cache RAM & Storage: 8GB, 8Gx1, DDR4, 2666MHz Ach & 512GB SSD Display & Graphics: 15.6" FHD WVA AG 120Hz 250 nits Narrow Border & Integrated Graphics

Sold by: Amazon

) }
